item.title: Michael add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "Anti-intellectualism has been a constant thread winding its way through our political and cultural life, nurtured by the false notion that democracy means that <i>'my ignorance is just as good as your knowledge.'</i>" -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Michael add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description:
"Tell me why the stars do shine, Tell me why the ivy twines, Tell me what makes skies so blue, And I'll tell you why I love you.
Nuclear fusion makes stars to shine, Tropisms make the ivy twine, Raleigh scattering make skies so blue, Testicular hormones are why I love you. " -- Isaac Asimov
